channel.title: Language Transfer | Spanish
channel.description: Please share far and wide and help us get this wonderful free resource out to as many people as possible! Please help support and shape LT for as little as $1 a month whilst voting for the next course to be created with The Thinking Method! www.patreon.com/languagetransfer
channel.itunes:subtitle: Learn Spanish as if you knew it already
channel.itunes:author: Language Transfer

item.title: Spanish Lesson 01
item.itunes:author: Language Transfer
item.itunes:summary: Please share far and wide and help us get this wonderful free resource out to as many people as possible! Learn more about us at www.languagetransfer.org where you can also donate and help LT continue to make great free language courses!
